communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Memo
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

A copy of the memo found in this article: 

Excerpt here: "In a June 4 memo labeled “Guidance,” Defense Secretary Ashton B. Carter outlined a subtle shift for the Pentagon’s renowned Office of Net Assessment and its new director, retired Air Force Col. Jim Baker. With Carter’s memo, the office, which traditionally looked towards the horizon when it comes to defense concerns, will incorporate more of today’s issues in its analyses."

https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/checkpoint/wp/2015/06/10/pentagon-chief-issues-new-marching-orders-for-yoda-office/

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

George Johnston

communications.subject: California Public Records Act Request: Truleo Contracts (Pinole Police Department)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Contracts, agreements, invoices, and any supporting documentation related to the use of applications named or provided by Truleo.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Mitchell Kotler

communications.subject: [Records Center] Welcome to the Records Request Center!
communications.communication:
Dear Requester, 
 
An online account has been created through the City of Pinole Public Record Request Portal. 
 
Your Login ID is: 153738-77906612@requests.muckrock.com 
 
If you did not submit your request through the online records request center but are receiving this e-mail, an account has been created for you to track and monitor the status of your request, and receive any documents in response to your request. 
 
 
If you have never used this system or cannot remember your password you may request a temporary password here: Request Temporary Password (https://u8387778.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=6HtRfOYLt5fXvpttM-2FU1HWy-2FrMvnRvG9D-2Bh-2BDxE2kW-2BPk89BK1l4JMdeauF8n33Cm3zsNpNTsOqzSWSqIC-2FAHfZ2dyCQXLCMo5xf3kzxtO0-3DfrD0_S4ZXHYgyqHUCyqPrT-2BhnvSWyRT8rIerJdyztqpCC-2BYMuxILWIQl0-2F594Y-2B1B8vE5I-2Bfg5CXCN-2BgZ1JEzKeCD-2BbCrmHIqehxe1GC9nlGy58AJ1Lkon9o-2F2PGdFc8cvj-2Fw-2Fj-2F-2FK0-2B7vdvjlcMKnPUaQYpb1v89X6aLulz6jt-2FgZqDxhkRxeh-2FxOjaVxQs0v7yls4jk0lpxXZ0hLmpp3LcSQz7itHhOyJ0ea58QekhuNu0-3D)

communications.subject: Public Records Request :: R000557-102923
communications.communication:
Dear Mitchell Kotler: 
Your request has been received and is being processed. Your request was received in this office on 10/29/2023 and given the reference number R000557-102923 for tracking purposes. 
 Records Requested: To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Contracts, agreements, invoices, and any supporting documentation related to the use of applications named or provided by Truleo.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Mitchell Kotler

Upload documents directly: https://accounts.muckrock.com/accounts/login/?next=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.muckrock.com%2Faccounts%2Flogin%2F%3Fnext%3D%252Faccounts%252Fagency_login%252Fpinole-police-department-19527%252Ftruleo-contracts-pinole-police-department-153738%252F%253F&url_auth_token=AABuUDT1892w6xI277MrfA0bvw0%3A1qxHfa%3AsfxJ9fTlXOCuYO2DEropD-EZzQM5uxwutbTts95gJsE 
Your request will be forwarded to the relevant department(s) to locate the information you seek. You will be contacted about the availability and/or provided with copies of the records in question. 
You can monitor the progress of your request at the link below and you'll receive an email when your request has been completed. 
 
City of Pinole
